ValidationRule.description: Revenue Data and Dates must be entered at this time in the Opportunity
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND (
OR ( ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Offer"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Negotiate"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Confirmed"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Closed Won") ),
AND( OR ( ISBLANK(TEXT(OTR_One_Time_Revenue__c)), ISBLANK(TEXT(MRR_Monthly_Recurring_Revenue__c)), ISBLANK(TEXT(Revenue_Start_Date__c)) )),
NOT(CONTAINS($Label.Users_Exclusion,$User.Username)), RecordType.DeveloperName =='Finleap_Connect_Standard_Sales' )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Rev. Start Date, MRR and OTR must be filled out at this point.
